descriptionlist.description: A theme for the loading indicator to turn it into the "beachball" one first found in OS X 10.11, El Capitan.

screenshot.description: How it looks in a black-type status bar.
How it looks in a white-type status bar.

changelog.change: Sorry this update took so long to come out. Lots happening in my life right now.
Partially fixed issue where indicator would sometimes only appear as a solid white ball.
This fix has only been tested on an iPhone 6S on iOS 9.3.3. Please give feedback if it's not good on your end.
I am looking into whether or not it is possible for it to always be coloured, but I think this is an Apple-imposed limitation. Give me time. I will try.
